Reset.Title: Initialize contents
Reset.Confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all contents and go back to the beginning? This action cannot be undone.

SignOut.Title: Sign Out
SignOut.Confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out? Your progress will be saved.

Name.Prompt: Please let the AI know the name or nickname you would like to be referred to as.

Narrative.Title: Jot down Your Challenging Story
Narrative.Prompt: Everyone has their own challenges. Feel free to write about any aspect of the difficult situation and the way you feel about it that comes to mind. Afterwards, AI will suggest various topics for you to think about regarding your difficulty, and through simple writing activities, it aims to help you better understand your worries and the thoughts surrounding them. Remember, all of your writing will be completely confidential.
Narrative.BackConfirm: Discard the current writing and go back to the previous screen?
Narrative.Helper: Please freely write about what has been weighing on your mind or presenting personal challenges lately. Before AI can assist you in better understanding these issues, this is a process for you to articulate the personal challenges you are encountering. **This is not a text meant to be shared with others.** Nobody will check, judge, or critique it. Do not worry about spelling, grammar, or punctuation when writing.

Theme.Title: Explore New Themes
Theme.CustomTitle: ðŸ¤” Is there no topic that interests you?

Tooltip.NewThread: Click to open a new thread with this theme.
Tooltip.PinTheme: Pin the theme to revisit it later.
Tooltip.UnpinTheme: Remove this theme from the pinned list.

Questions.Title: Questions to Think About
Questions.NoQuestionPlaceholder: Choose one of the questions from the list below to think about.

Tooltip.Description: Press this when it's hard to think. It will show you words that help draw out expressions or thoughts from your mind.

Tooltip.Title: AI comment
Tooltip.Description: Refer to this when you're unsure how to continue writing. It can help guide your thoughts.

Summary.ButtonHint: You can check the AI summary distilled from the current exploration.
Summary.Title: AI Summary
Summary.CompleteMessage: The session has ended. Thank you :).
Summary.BackToExplore: Go back to the Exploration Page
Summary.FinalReflection: Through this exploration, what have you learned or newly realized about yourself and your situation? Feel free to write down whatever comes to mind.

Info.NewTheme: You can browse themes related to your personal challenge.
Info.Outline: Lists up the expanded themes in order.
